## DO-178C Compliance Checklist
<!-- For DAL D certification, verify the following -->

### Software Development Process
- [ ] Code follows established coding standards (Python with type hints)
- [ ] Changes are documented in code comments where necessary

### Software Verification Process
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`pytest`)
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Code has been reviewed (self-review or peer review)
- [ ] Linting passes (`ruff check`)

### Configuration Management
- [ ] Changes are committed with descriptive commit messages
- [ ] Version number updated if applicable

### Traceability
- [ ] Changes trace to a requirement or issue (link below)
